detail_desc: Ankle-length joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, discreet side pockets, flap leg pockets with a concealed press-stud, and gently tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems. Brushed inside.
Pyjamas with a jersey T-shirt top and woven shorts. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a plastic buckle. Width approx. 1.6 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft stretch jersey with a slightly wider neckline and slits in the sides.

Shell trousers in wind- and waterproof breathable functional fabric with closed seams. Adjustable elasticated waist, reflective strips on one leg and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Set with a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey and skirt in a double layer of tulle. Top with a print motif on the front and a flounce over the shoulders. Skirt with an elasticated waist. Lined.

Short dress in crinkled chiffon with a unique nursing feature. V-neck with a drawstring at the front, long, raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the hem for added width to the skirt. Partly lined. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. Can be worn both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a turtle neck and short sleeves.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, concealed button placket, long sleeves and a seam at the waist with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Wide jumper in a fine, sturdy knit with low dropped shoulders, balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs and ribbing at the neckline and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted jersey dress with long, straight sleeves. Unlined.

Set with a soft, non-wired bra and a pair of briefs in lace. Bra with adjustable shoulder straps, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners. Briefs with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Cargo trousers in soft washed cotton twill with fake front pockets, real back pockets and flap leg pockets. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 1½-10Y), a fake fly and slim legs with short slits at the hems.
Cotton canvas trainers with a padded top edge, lacing and a tongue with a fabric appliqué at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband. The polyester content of the tights is partly recycled.
Block-striped dress in a fine-knit cotton blend containing some wool with buttons at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Shoulder bag in imitation leather with imitation suede side panels. Narrow shoulder strap, a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Size approx. 12x19x24 cm.
Brogues in imitation leather with lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in crinkled, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and a lace trim and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend.
Trousers in viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Hipster briefs in organic cotton jersey with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, wide, sports top in printed, fast-drying mesh layered over a vest top with a racer back.
Hat knitted in soft cashmere with a roll edge.
Short dress in slub jersey made from a linen blend with short, frill-trimmed sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a motif on the front and cut-out sections on the shoulders. Slightly longer at the back.
Knitted cashmere scarf with ribbing on the short sides. Size 50x170 cm.

Sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with folded, glued edges. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. High support, designed for use during high-intensity training. Some of the polyester content of the bra is recycled.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft cotton jersey with a collar and button placket.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Jacket in soft faux fur with notch lapels and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front. Lined.
Short, fitted skirt in patterned jersey. High waist with concealed elastication, and a slit at the front of the hem.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts in a soft modal and cotton blend. T-shirt in jersey with a print motif on the front. Shorts in a patterned weave with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Boxy jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with a large collar, dropped shoulders, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Elasticated, fabric-covered scrunchies.
Straight-cut coat woven in a wool blend with a detachable tie belt, welt front pockets and a single back vent. No buttons.
Short, sleeveless jersey dress with a V-neck at the back and seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Double-layered sports top in fast-drying functional fabric and mesh with a print motif on the front, racer back and cap sleeves.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with moulded, lightly padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated trim at the hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
High-waisted jersey leggings.
Canvas slides with a large bow on the front and a braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit alpaca and wool blend with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.

Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband, an opening for the heels, and anti-slip protectors on the bottom of the feet.
Adjustable waist belt in imitation suede and grained imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width approx. 4 cm.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pocket with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Stand-up collar, a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Welt side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Pleated trousers in jersey with a sheen, with an elasticated waist and slim legs that flare at the hems. Overlocked edges at the hems.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fully lined triangle bikini top with removable inserts and ties at the back and back of the neck.

Parka in a nylon and cotton weave with a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover fastening. Diagonal front pockets with a flap and press-stud and an adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs. Concealed drawstring at the waist and hem, and a single back vent. Lined.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Knee-length swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a flap back pocket with a press-stud. Mesh inner shorts.
Smocked bikini top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved body in jersey with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front, seam under the bust and lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Double-layered jersey top in a cotton blend with hard-worn details, raw edge cuffs and a raw-edge, rounded hem.
Fine-knit ankle socks in a cotton blend with wide elastication at the top.
Flounced skirt in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace and mesh with removable inserts that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, mesh-lined cups and a hook-and-eye fastening.

No-show trainer socks in a fine, fast-drying, functional knit. The socks are low cut so they are hidden inside your shoes. Ribbed section over the foot and a concealed silicone trim at the heels for best fit. The polyester content of the socks is partly recycled.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. Wide, short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Short shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Sock boots with round toes, a zip at the top and covered heels. Mesh linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Sarong in patterned satin with long ties at the top.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft pattern knit with hole-knit sections, long, wide sleeves and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Stocking-stitched back.

Suit trousers woven in a wool blend with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.

Shirt in washed denim with a concealed button-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and loops at the top of the shaft. Linings and insoles in soft faux shearling, and chunky soles.

Oversized, calf-length trenchcoat in Tencel™ lyocell twill with a collar, press-studs down the front and extended shoulder tabs with press-studs. Adjustable tab with a press-stud at the cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist and flap front pockets with press-studs. Loose yoke at the back, and a single back vent with a tab and press-stud. Lined.
Jumper in fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Nightdress in soft, printed cotton jersey with short flutter sleeves.
Cropped sleeveless top in cotton jersey with a text print at the top.
